Class EarthServerGenericClient.SceneManager

SceneManager is the main class of the unified client. All scene models are registered in this class with the add() function. The createScene() function creates a x3dom scene with all scene models.
Defined in: SceneModules.js.

EarthServerGenericClient.SceneManager()
Field Detail
annotationLayers
<inner> axisLabels
This variable contains the AxisLabel object. This object manages the labels and its appearances on each axis.
Default Value:
null
baseElevation
Every Model has it's base elevation on the Y-Axis. Needed to change and restore the elevation.
Default Value:
[]
currentUIElement
The current chosen UI element, which is a Model. Change everything for the model with that ID.
Default Value:
[]
<inner> maxResolution
Max resolution per dimension (standard PC)
Default Value:
1000 (200 on a mobile platform)
modelLoadingProgress
An Array to store the models loading progress.
Default Value:
[]
models
An Array of scene models.
Default Value:
[]
progressCallback
Callback function for the progress update.
Default Value:
undefined
TimeLog
Enables/Disables the logging of Serverrequests,building of terrain etc.
Default Value:
false
totalLoadingProgress
Value for the loading progress bar (all model loading combined).
Default Value:
0

Name of the X-Axis to be displayed.
Default Value:
"x"
yLabel
Name of the Y-Axis to be displayed.
Default Value:
"y"
zLabel
Name of the Z-Axis to be displayed.
Default Value:
"z"
Method Detail
addAnnotation(AnnotationLayerName, xPos, yPos, zPos, Text)
Adds an annotation to an existing annotation layer.
Parameters:
AnnotationLayerName
- Name of the annotation layer to add the annotation to.
xPos
- Position on the x-axis of the annotation.
yPos
- Position on the y-axis of the annotation.
zPos
- Position on the z-axis of the annotation.
Text
- Text of the annotation.
addAnnotationsLayer(name, fontSize, fontColor, fontHover, markerSize, markerColor)
Adds an AnnotationsLayer to the scene.
Parameters:
name
- Name of the Layer. You need the name of a layer to add annotations to it.
fontSize
- Font size of all annotations added to this layer.
fontColor
- Color of all annotations added to this layer.
fontHover
- The annotation text hovers above the annotation marker by this value.
markerSize
- The size if the annotation marker
markerColor
- Color of the annotation marker
addModel(model)
Adds any scene model to the scene.
Parameters:
model
Any type of scene model.
createAxisLabels()
createModels()
This function starts to load all models. You call this when the html is loaded or later on a click.
createScene(x3dID, sceneID, cubeSizeX, cubeSizeY, cubeSizeZ)
Creates and returns the whole X3DOM Scene in the fishtank/cube with all added scene models. The Sizes of the cube are assumed as aspect ratios with values between 0 and 1. Example createScene("x3dom_div",1.0, 0.3, 0.5 ) Cube has 30% height and 50 depth compared to the width.
Parameters:
x3dID
- ID of the x3d dom element
sceneID
- ID of the scene element
cubeSizeX
- width of the cube
cubeSizeY
- height of the cube
cubeSizeZ
- depth of the cube
createUI(domElementID)
This creates the UI for the Scene.
Parameters:
domElementID
- The dom element where to append the UI.
{number} getAnnotationLayerIndex(AnnotationLayerName)
Returns the index of an existing AnnotationLayer in the array or -1 if no layer with the given name was found.
Parameters:
AnnotationLayerName
- Name of the Layer
Returns:
{number} - Either index in the array or -1 if not found
{Number} getMaxResolution()
Returns the maximum resolution per dimension of a scene model. This number depends on power templates (e.g. mobile device).
Returns:
{Number}
reportProgress(modelIndex)
All Modules and Terrain shall report their loading progress. Modules when they receive data and terrains if they are done building the terrain. Every time this function is called 1 is added to the total progress. It is assumed that for every request a terrain is build thus 100% = model.requests*2 If a callback is registered the function is called, otherwise the progress is printed to the console or ignored.
Parameters:
modelIndex
- Index of the model.
setAxisLabels(xLabel, yLabel, zLabel)
Sets the names of the axes to be displayed.
Parameters:
xLabel
- width
yLabel
- height
zLabel
- depth
setProgressCallback(callback)
Sets the callback function for the progress update. The progress function gives a parameter between 0-100. You can set callback = null for no progress update at all. If no callback is given at all the progress is printed to the console.
Parameters:
callback
setTimeLog(value)
Enables or disables the logging.
Parameters:
value
- Boolean
setView(camID)
Sets the view of the X3Dom window to the predefined camera.
Parameters:
camID
- ID of the Camera dom object.
timeLogEnd(eventName)
Ends the timer for a logging event with the given name and prints the result.
Parameters:
eventName
timeLogStart(eventName)
Starts the timer for a logging event with the given name.
Parameters:
eventName
updateElevation(value)
This changes the scaling on the Y-Axis(Elevation).
Parameters:
value
- The base elevation is multiplied by this value
updateOffset(which, value)
Update Offset changes the position of the current selected SceneModel on the x-,y- or z-Axis.
Parameters:
which
- Which Axis will be changed (0:X 1:Y 2:Z)
value
- The new position
updateTransparency(value)
Changes the transparency of the Scene Model.
Parameters:
value
- New Transparency between 0-1 (Fully Opaque - Fully Transparent)
